The day had basically been hell. The smell had been increasing over time, be it by accident or on purpose, her toes kept squeezing him, and to top it off, he couldn't even pass out, since every time he did, he woke up immediately due to her stepping on him. The only silver lining was that the bottom of her foot and toes were quite soft, so it was only partially painful. Though he knew that it was about to end, after the muffled voices stop, and her movements slowly began to come to a halt.

There was one more, drawn out weight, with his face being buried into the flesh of Nunnally's sole, as she slips off the shoe on her other foot. It leaves after a few moments, and he has the feeling of being lifted, so it was time for him to be liberated from the sweat filled shoe. However, when he was finally freed, he did not drop, nor was he removed. He couldn't see due to him facing her foot, but he could tell that his body was dropping back to the ground. Apparently, with the sweat and pressure of being stepped on, he became plastered to her sole. And naturally, after the party she was supposed to have gone to, it is highly unlikely that she would remember a random insect that she let into her shoe. Despite whatever oddity of a Foot Fetish she thought the bug had, or the fact that it was actually her older brother and not a bug at all.

He could hear her humming, as his body presses into the ground below her. The ground is considerably harder than her shoes, so this hurts a bit more than before, not that saying 'ouch' would solve anything. He only had to put up with it for a few more moments, only until she reached her bed. Which, as luck would have it, was now. He felt a slightly sickening feeling as her legs swung over the bed. Odds are, that despite how pleased she was after the party, she was still exhausted, so she probably wasn't going to bother changing. Possibly for the best, for Lelouch in any case.

And suddenly, the first good thing that had happened all day. Either due to his being pressed against actual ground, or the force of her legs swinging over, he was finally in a position to move his arm, which he immediately used to push his body off her foot. He could hear a slight 'pop' as he detached his face from the flesh, and he breathes in the semi-fresh air. Though due to the close proximity, he accidentally swallows a bit of the sweat that remains on him. Though it wasn't enough to make him halt any movement, nor even gag.

As he was still, slightly attached to her sole, Lelouch takes the opportunity to climb to the tops of her toes. He should be able to check the situation from there. Once he reached the top, he had to wipe his hand on his pants, both due to the sweat and a small bit of muck from the in betweens of her toes. After scanning the room, or more specifically, his sister and the bed she lies on. He came to the conclusion that the only thing he could do was to wake her up, since she went to sleep nearly immediately. Luckily she hadn't put the blanket on yet, so he is free to act. The areas that would be most effective to wake her up are likely going to be, around her chest, groin, ears or lips. There was also the option of her soles, but Lelouch has had about enough of feet for a while, and her eyes could hurt her, which he would like to avoid at all costs.

Finally time for action...

115112.content:
He continued to jump up and down, even after she saw him, not wanting to get his hopes up. But when he saw her mouth open, and spoke, "Lelouch?" he allowed himself to feel tremendous amounts of joy. Both between the fact that he has been seen and that despite her being blind this whole time, she was able to recognize him nearly immediately.

"Yes, Nunnally! It is me!" He let out a loud scream, but Nunnally could barely recognize the noise at all, and in response sat on her knees as she continued to look at him. She stared at him with a bit more focus, presumably to determine if it was indeed her brother, and once she confirmed it, a bright smile could be seen on her face.

Strong emotion could be seen in her eyes, but instead of showing any signs of joy or sorrow, she gives an expression of concern as she speak, "It is you! But... How did you get so small? Even though I was blind, I know you weren't this small when you were taking care of me..." She stares at him a bit more before noticing where he was, "Also, why are you in my shoes, Lelouch?" He was almost glad that she couldn't hear him even if he tried to say something. He felt that he'd make her feel bad if he said that she had kicked him in here on accident.

Though, with her not saying anything more, he decided to move around a bit, waving his arms towards himself to try and tell her to pick him up, but she only gives another confused stare. But after a few moments, her eyes light up as though she'd realized what was happening. He felt happy since this meant he could get out, but that was dampened when she spoke again, "Ah... Lelouch, did you develop a thing for feet over the years? And were wanting to be stepped on?" The small prince stared dumbfounded for a few moments, but wasn't able to do anything but shake his head and resume his previous actions, "Or maybe you wanted to fulfill your desire and surprise me by hiding in there? Regardless, this is much too dangerous of a thing to do for simple satisfaction!" She almost sounded upset, despite the fact that it was caused only due to her own actions and misunderstanding.

"No Nunnally, that's not what this is! Please, hurry and take me out of here!" It was to no avail, as he already knew, but this would end badly if he didn't do something. Otherwise, he would need to wait and hope she realizes what was happening, but the odds of that were unlikely, especially with the current trail of events.

"I'm sure you've had your fun, so I want you to get out of there." She looked at him scoldingly, as a mother would a child that had done something wrong. This seemed slightly unfair, but seeing as he could couldn't climb out of this, he simply began to jump again. Though, with all that he was doing before, he had run a bit low on stamina, causing him fall over backwards to catch his breath. However this only served to worsen his situation as he heard Nunnally sigh. "Ever since we were kids, you have always been so stubborn. Though you've never been so keen on doing something dangerous like this. Then fine, I suppose... I haven't been able to do anything for you in thanks of taking care of me all this time. So, in order to both satisfy and thank you, we can have you be my insole... I'll try not to hurt you, but you can't complain about the smell after all this."

The situation was growing even more ridiculous, and he could only shake his head as he laid on his back. Hoping that she takes him out to speak before doing this.

And so, staring down at her shrunken brother, what does Nunnally do next?

1553212.content:
"So..." Princess Cornelia's delicate lips slowly formed the words as she stared at the vial in front of her. "You're telling me that this... liquid... will allow me to finally put those filthy elevens in their place, single handedly?" The light green liquid bubbled and fizzed as she held the tube in her hand. It looked dangerous, despite the insistence of the scientists around her.

"Yes, Your Highness." The lead researcher quickly said, nodding frantically. Only a few hours ago Cornelia had not known of the man's existence, and now here he was offering, according to him, incredible power. "We were originally commissioned by His Highness, the recently deceased Prince Clovis, to pursue an offshoot of certain other research he was pursuing. It eventually bore fruit in the form of this solution."

Cornelia's eyebrow raised in curiosity, but she elected not to pursue the topic. Clovis had always had various projects running in the background, and it was not odd that they would bear some type of fruit. "And so, why are you offering this to me? And how do I know this isn't some type of poison?"

The researcher's nodding seemed to increase to a frantic pace, so fast that his glasses seemed likely to fly off. A bit of disgust at his sycophantic attitude flittered through Cornelia's eyes, but she still listened as he shot his way through his answer quickly. Not chosen for his eloquence, this one. "Seeing how Lord Clovis di-- is no longer with us, we thought that Your Highness would be the best candidate to put the formula to good use. In addition, we decided that you could help us with the... financial costs... of pursuing the project. And as for whether it is safe or not, Sally, come here." He pointed at a young woman with brown hair and dressed in the same white labcoat as the rest of the team. "If you don't mind, Your Highness," He said as he reached out and took the vial from Cornelia's hand. With careful precision he scooped out a tiny drop of the formula. "Sally, stick out your tongue." The woman obeyed. Daintily he put the drop on the tip of the woman's tongue and stepped back.

For a second the girl stood still, her tongue still poking out. Then, she started shaking. A yell escaped her lips as she doubled over, then suddenly exploded outwards. In less than two seconds she went from average height to over 20 feet tall. Miraculously her clothes grew with her. Still shaking, the woman lifted her head upwards and looked at Cornelia, her eyes glossed with pleasure.

Cornelia and her attendants could merely stare in wonder.

"And this is only the most readily visible of the effects, Your Highness."

Slowly, a laugh began to escape the Princess' lips. This was it. It was perfect. The laugh grew and soon was reaching across the entire room as the busty Princess stood, walked over to the researcher, grabbed the vial and promptly swallowed the entire thing.
